mapper.insert: INSERT INTO users ( user_sq, user_id, user_password, user_name, user_birthday, gender, user_phone, user_email, user_post, user_basic_addr, user_detail_addr, user_role, user_stat ) VALUES ( seq_users_sq.NEXTVAL, #{userId}, #{userPassword}, #{userName}, #{userBirthday}, #{gender}, #{userPhone}, #{userEmail}, #{userPost}, #{userBasicAddr}, #{userDetailAddr}, 1, 1 )
mapper.select: SELECT user_sq as userSq, user_id AS userId, user_password AS userPassword, user_role AS userRole FROM users WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND user_password = #{userPassword}

SELECT user_id AS userid, user_password AS userpassword, user_name AS username, user_birthday AS userbirthday, gender, user_phone AS userphone, user_email AS useremail, user_post AS userpost, user_basic_addr AS userbasicaddr, user_detail_addr AS userdetailaddr, user_join_date AS userjoindate, user_withdrawal_date AS userwithdrawaldate, user_role AS userrole, user_stat AS userstat FROM users WHERE user_sq = #{userSq}
